content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, nice to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the desirable location and modern features of the apartment, my initial offer for the rental price would be 450 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiation and finding a mutual agreement.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am aiming for a higher price. Let's see if we can find a price that works better for me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing your perspective but unfortunately, this apartment has not yet surpassed my budget expectations. I wish you success in finding a suitable renter for the property. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
